meanings.sent1: The noninfected patient had a strong immune system.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the wound was noninfected.
meanings.sent3: The noninfected fruit looked perfect for eating.
meanings.sent4: Her noninfected mind was clear and focused.
meanings.sent5: The noninfected area of the city remained untouched by the virus.

meanings.sent2: The noninfected water was safe to drink.
